survey_brief: This survey aims to understand public adoption and perceptions of smart city technologies, such as IoT infrastructure, smart lighting, and traffic management systems.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart city technologies are you aware of in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections; ensure options are locally relevant.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart city technologies are you aware of in your area?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the smart city technologies available in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale; include 'Not applicable' for respondents who selected 'None' in Q1.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the smart city technologies available in your area?

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about smart city technologies?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections; randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about smart city technologies?

questions.question_text: Would you support increased investment in smart city technologies in your area?
